description: Core search and ranking algorithms for game retrieval and relevance ranking
purpose: These functions implement the system's core search capabilities, including BM25 keyword search, Faiss semantic search, fusion ranking algorithms, and query validation. They transform user queries into high-quality search results.

algorithms.name: BM25
algorithms.description: Classic keyword search algorithm based on term frequency and document frequency

algorithms.name: Faiss
algorithms.description: Vector similarity search for semantic understanding

algorithms.name: Fusion Ranking
algorithms.description: Combines multiple search results with comprehensive scoring

algorithms.name: Query Validation
algorithms.description: Query validation and sanitization to prevent injection attacks

documentation: Search algorithms are the core competitive advantage of the system, providing high-quality search results by combining traditional keyword matching with modern semantic understanding.
